code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images=[{id:'india',title:'India',alt:'Taj Mahal at sunrise, India',src:'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1549880338-65ddcdfd017b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1400&q=80'},{id:'usa',title:'USA',alt:'New York skyline at dusk, USA',src:'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1505765050928-52f6f4b5b8f8?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1400&q=80'},{id:'malaysia',title:'Malaysia',alt:'Petronas Twin Towers, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia',src:'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1491553895911-0055eca6402d?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1400&q=80'},{id:'dubai',title:'Dubai',alt:'Burj Khalifa skyline, Dubai',src:'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542317854-9f6a2b88dc2a?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1400&q=80'}];const HeroImages=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"w-full max-w-5xl mx-auto mb-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4",children:images.map((img,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl shadow-lg bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 transform transition-all duration-400 hover:scale-105 hover:-translate-y-1 z-0",style:{minHeight:140},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img.src,alt:img.alt,className:"w-full h-full object-cover block pop-up-image",style:{display:'block'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute left-3 bottom-3 px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-white/75 dark:bg-black/50 text-sm font-semibold text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100 backdrop-blur",children:img.title})]},img.id))})});};export default HeroImages;
